name: Professional Programming With Python
body: Professional Programming With Python- course is for those who want to be job ready or to strengthen their CV. This course provides all the python knowledge that someone needs to apply to real-world applications. After this course, students will have their two personal projects and a complete CV and GitHub contributions, increasing their chances of getting a job earlier. Students, who are willing to learn python for programming contests or projects are also requested to join because this course will help them to have a clear concept of the python programming language
